title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 67 - Ophthalmic Dispensing
content:

State Regulations
§ 67.1 - Education requirement
§ 67.2 - Alternative training and experience requirements
§ 67.3 - Examinations
§ 67.4 - Training permits
§ 67.5 - Supervision of fitting contact lenses
§ 67.6 - Continuing education for ophthalmic dispensers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 67

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 210, 212, 6501, 6502, 6504, 6506, 6507, 6508, 7121, 7124, 7125, 7128; L. 1997, ch. 520

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
